relation: Winter month with pleasant cold ambiance. Sunny and windy days followed by cold nights. Perfect time to visit the city and enjoy sightseeing as well as other tourist activities. It is advisable to carry some light warm clothes during your trip.

Pleasant warm days with cold evenings. It is an ideal time for tourist to enjoy visiting various attractions of the place. Outdoor enthusiasts can also enjoy water-sports and other adventurous activities. It is recommended to carry some light woolen clothes.

Summer season begins. During day time temperature goes high but it becomes very pleasant in the evening. It may not be the best season for visit but outdoor enthusiasts can still enjoy water sports and adventure activities like paragliding, horse riding etc.
Sunny days with dry and hot climate but mornings and evenings are very pleasant. If you are planning to visit Pune during this period, it is advisable to carry sun - protecting stuffs.

Very hot and sunny days followed by pleasant evenings. If you are planning to explore Pune in this month then make sure you have all your carry sun - protective gears. Besides, summer days are also preferable for enjoying water-sports .

Extremely hot days, but the nights are pleasant. Monsoon arrives in the mid of this month, and the temperature drops down to a comfortable level, which makes it possible for tourist visits. But be sure to carry rain gears.
Monsoon month, heavy rainfall occurs frequently. However, the weather is pleasant making it ideal for tourist visits. It is recommended to carry rain gears.

The climate is moderate but infrequent rainfall may occur. Weather is comfortable for sightseeing activities and exploring the city. It is also a good month for indulging in outdoor trips/activities.

November is called 'Rosy Cold' month. Best time to explore the place, cool breeze makes the weather extremely pleasant and refreshing. Sightseeing, water related activities and adventure activities like trekking, paragliding and horse riding are very enjoyable during this period.

textAfterTable: View all photos Best Season: Jul - Feb Summer 20 to 42Â°C, Winter 8 to 32Â°C Best Season / Best time to visit Pune Pune experiences both hot and cold climates in a year. The best time to visit is from July to February. Winters (November to February) are characterized by medium level of humidity and warm cool weather. During winters minimum temperature can go below 10°C. Most of the tourists prefer this period. Summers (March to June) are hot and temperature going up to 42°C, and tourists typically avoid visiting Pune during the peak summer days in April and May. Monsoons (July to September) are accompanied by mild to average rainfalls and offers relief to hot summer. October to February is ideal for sightseeing and city activities. July to September is pleasant with cool and humid atmosphere. Be aware that in monsoons, water clogging on roads is very common.
